name: Fred (DoughnutDev)
description:
This is a simple platformer about a simple mushroom.

Run, jump, and explore through ten levels and one secret level!

Besides the secret level this game is secret filled! With everything from secret paths to secret dialogue and secret shortcuts! There is much to be enjoyed in Fred.

So why not take a little while to play? 

Play on Newgorunds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/852422

Version 1.0.1 updates:

    -Bug fixes:

        - Fixed wrong amount of stars displayed on end screen.

        - Fixed that the secret level starts at checkpoint. 

    -Gameplay:

        -Slowed decay rate in the secret level.
